prompt: Free online services are often free because they make money based on the information they gather while you use their services. What is the concern with this service-for-information model?
feedback: Many Internet companies make money by using information. Maybe they sell targeted ads. Maybe they sell information to marketing companies or retailers. It’s a way to finance services and make the company profitable. The biggest concern with this service-for-information model is the consumers’ privacy. Companies can track what you look at and do on their websites, as well as gather information that you provide. How companies use that information is a concern for privacy advocates.
